title: Investigate the Suspicious Toys
content: s full of traps, disarm them or the blackmail letter may be burnt.(Use the hatch to enter basement.) After you found the blackmail letter in a toymaker's cellar. Talk to the Flaming Fist in front of the Warehouse. You can find the suspicious toy in one of the crates. Talk to Flaming Fist again to report your findings.
